Name: Batsumaru
About the game: BATSUMARU is a short and minimalist puzzle game. I wanted to create a relaxing and casual experience that is approachable to all levels of puzzle gamers, and will provide a logical challenge. The game features about 70 puzzles and several different puzzle mechanics that I hope will surprise you! Thank you for playing, and for all your support. \ (´～｀)/ ~Tyler Rae
